intro.title: Welcome to the Dungeon, Meatbag!
story: You wake up in a cold, metallic room. A neon sign blinks: "Welcome, Contestant #4287!". A small drone with a single, unblinking eye hovers nearby, its voice dripping with synthetic sarcasm.
"Congratulations! You have been selected for the 47th season of *Murder Dungeon Deluxe*! Try not to die in the first five minutes like the last guy."
A door slides open, revealing two equally terrible choices.

options.text: Step into the corridor filled with ominous clicking sounds.
Take the suspiciously friendly-looking path with the bright neon sign that says "FREE LOOT".

spider_hall.title: The Clickety-Clack Horror
story: You step into the corridor, and immediately regret it. Thousands of robotic spiders, each the size of a dinner plate, scuttle toward you with unsettling precision.
A monitor flickers on. "Ohhh, contestant #4287 is in trouble! Will they fight, or will they run like a coward?"
The audience is watching. Choose wisely.

options.text: Charge forward and smash as many as you can!
Run like your life depends on it (because it does).

boss_fight.title: Final Showdown!
story: You stand before the dungeon's ultimate challenge. The monstrous mechanical overlord looms over you, its glowing red eyes scanning for weaknesses.
A booming voice echoes through the arena: "Ladies and gentlemen, the moment you've all been waiting for! Will Contestant #4287 survive, or will they be reduced to a fine red mist?"
The audience roars. The fight is on.
With a battle cry, you charge forward...

trap_room.title: Too Good to Be True
story: The room is filled with glowing treasure chests. A holographic clown appears, grinning. "Go ahead! Pick a prize! No tricks, we promise!"
The clown winks. That’s never a good sign.
The audience chat is filled with skull emojis.

options.text: Open the biggest chest. Bigger is always better, right?
Check for traps before doing anything stupid.

mimic_attack.title: Treasure or Trap?
story: As soon as you touch the chest, it shudders violently. A gaping maw filled with razor-sharp teeth lunges at you!
The holographic clown bursts into laughter. "Oh, you poor fool!"
You barely manage to dodge the first snap, but the mimic is still coming for you!

options.text: Try to fight it off with your bare hands!
Run for your life and find another way out!

combat_spiders.title: Legs, So Many Legs!
story: You swing wildly, crushing several mechanical abominations. The crowd cheers! But there are so many…
A massive spider-bot, its fangs dripping with glowing green acid, drops from the ceiling. "Final Boss Mode Engaged", it announces. Oh no.

options.text: Fight the boss! Glory or death!
Dive into a maintenance tunnel to escape.

escape_vent.title: Into the Darkness
story: You scramble into a tight vent, crawling away from certain death. Something skitters behind you. Was that a whisper?
Your only way forward is down a dark shaft. No turning back now.

options.text: Slide down and hope for the best.
Turn and fight whatever’s behind you.

mystery_drop.title: Freefall into the Unknown
story: You take a deep breath and slide down the shaft. The walls blur past as you plummet into darkness.
You land with a *thud* on something... soft? It shifts beneath you. A low growl fills the air.
Lights flicker on, revealing a monstrous, tentacled beast. You’ve landed right in its nest!

options.text: Try to sneak away before it notices you.

spider_revenge.title: Face Your Fears
story: You spin around, fists clenched. The skittering noise grows louder.
A massive spider-bot lunges from the darkness, its mandibles snapping inches from your face!
The crowd erupts in cheers as the ultimate battle begins.

options.text: Go for the weak points and destroy it!
Use the vent’s tight walls to your advantage and escape!

secret_door.title: Hidden Passage
story: You carefully examine the floor and walls. Your patience pays off when you find a loose stone revealing a hidden lever.
With a soft *click*, a portion of the wall swings open, revealing a dimly lit passageway leading deeper into the dungeon.
The clown groans in disappointment. "Boring! But fine, let's see where this leads..."

options.text: Head back and take your chances with the chests.
